stories.original_headline: A hidden T cell switch could make cancer immunotherapy work for more people
stories.original_summary: Scientists have discovered that T cell receptors activate through a hidden spring-like motion that had never been seen before. This breakthrough may help explain why immunotherapy works for some cancers and how it could be improved for others.
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Secret to Potent Healing Charms!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Alchemists' Guild has discovered a hidden mechanism within the body's mystical wards. This spring-like motion explains how some healing enchantments combat the dark sickness. This new knowledge could lead to more potent charms for many ailing people.
